value.title: Lang.ai looks to help orgs extract value from customer conversations, with AI

value.title: Auditing Of AI Is Tricky, Especially When It Comes To Assessing AI Ethics Compliance, And Vexing Too For Auditing Those Autonomous Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: AI auditing is still a nascent capability and often overlooks AI Ethics compliance. This will inexorably change and be increasingly vital, including even in the case of AI-based self-driving cars.
